description:
On a night of thunder and rain, a man gives Lupin a doll. That very night Lupin has a nightmare of being manipulated by a man named Mephistopheles. The next day there is a news report that a diamond called the Phoenix`s Tear had been stolen. Though Lupin had been caught on security camera, he has no recollection of having done the deed. What is going on?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akuma ga Lupin o Maneku Toki
When the Devil Beckons to Lupin
悪魔がルパンを招くとき
